name: Test of the Covert Spy Tank
name_original: Test of the Covert Spy Tank
description:
Welcome back, Agent. The agency has recently taken the M1 Abrams tank that Agent Hotman stole from the enemy and we have modified into the Covert Spy Tank. We need you to get out there and test it. Good luck!

Player 1 Controls:

W to move forward

S to move backward

A to turn left

D to turn right

F to fire

Player 2 Controls:

Up arrow key to move forward

Down arrow key to move backward

Left arrow key to turn left

Right arrow key to turn right

J to fire

If you like this game, I bet you'll enjoy the games that inspired it:

https://poki.com/en/g/tank-off

https://tanktrouble.com
